channel.title: Hacked:S:S? Need Help!
channel.description:
hi, i had bring my server online today : pwning-scape.no-ip.org.. but after 5min i had someting wrong.. perhaps 11 of the same accounts logged in and start spamming the server... i wanna know how i get those people auto banned.. also i wanted to change information about the server on server page.. and perhaps there is a password on it-_-...
im hosting my server via a download program, i didnt do anyting with my router.. but is that a hacker thats on it or not :S:S??

item.title: Hacked:S:S? Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

… your server will keep getting crashed by ppl if you have someone advertising on other ppls server… or they think u leeched or ur server is gay… lol

just turn it off for 5 mins every time they try to bot it up or crash it

Read full topic
